12c6448c-04e1-4fa2-90ed-64027c32c1e7.title: Web Development Bootcamp
12c6448c-04e1-4fa2-90ed-64027c32c1e7.description: An intensive program designed to teach you the fundamentals of web development, covering both front-end and back-end technologies.

lessons.title: Getting Started with HTML
lessons.description: Learn the basics of HTML, the standard markup language for creating web pages.

lessons.title: Styling with CSS
lessons.description: Understand how to style your HTML using CSS, including layout techniques and responsive design.

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, the programming language of the web.

lessons.title: DOM Manipulation
lessons.description: Understand how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript.

lessons.title: Introduction to Node.js
lessons.description: Learn the basics of Node.js, a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

lessons.title: Building APIs with Express
lessons.description: Understand how to build and structure APIs using the Express.js framework.

d209676c-74c0-44af-8160-b73088691585.title: Data Science Fundamentals
d209676c-74c0-44af-8160-b73088691585.description: A comprehensive course covering the essential concepts and tools in data science, including statistics, data manipulation, and machine learning.

lessons.title: What is Data Science?
lessons.description: An overview of data science, its importance in the modern world, and key areas of application.

lessons.title: Data Science Tools
lessons.description: A look at the common tools and software used in data science, such as Python, R, and SQL.

lessons.title: Descriptive Statistics
lessons.description: Learn about measures of central tendency, dispersion, and how to summarize data.

lessons.title: Inferential Statistics
lessons.description: An introduction to hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, and making inferences from data.

lessons.title: Working with Pandas
lessons.description: Learn how to manipulate data using the Pandas library in Python, including data frames, indexing, and filtering.

lessons.title: Data Cleaning Techniques
lessons.description: Understand how to clean and prepare your data for analysis, including handling missing data and outliers.

e1c6f031-fab6-49c6-a7a8-e1034ef17a1e.title: Full Stack Development Mastery
e1c6f031-fab6-49c6-a7a8-e1034ef17a1e.description: An advanced program designed to equip learners with the skills needed to build complete web applications from scratch, covering both front-end and back-end technologies, along with deployment strategies.

lessons.title: Advanced HTML & CSS
lessons.description: Deep dive into HTML5 and CSS3, exploring complex layouts, animations, and responsive design techniques.

lessons.title: JavaScript & DOM Manipulation
lessons.description: Master JavaScript, focusing on ES6+ features, and learn how to manipulate the DOM efficiently to create dynamic web pages.

lessons.title: Introduction to React
lessons.description: Get started with React, learning about components, state management, and hooks to build interactive UIs.

lessons.title: Introduction to Node.js
lessons.description: Learn about Node.js, its architecture, and how to set up a basic server for handling requests and responses.

lessons.title: Building RESTful APIs with Express
lessons.description: Understand how to design and build RESTful APIs using Express.js, including routing, middleware, and error handling.

lessons.title: Database Design & SQL
lessons.description: Explore relational databases, SQL, and learn how to design normalized database schemas for efficient data storage and retrieval.

lessons.title: Connecting Front-End to Back-End
lessons.description: Learn how to integrate the front-end with back-end APIs, managing data flow and ensuring seamless communication between client and server.

lessons.title: Authentication & Authorization
lessons.description: Implement secure user authentication and authorization using JWT, OAuth2, and session management techniques.

lessons.title: Real-Time Communication with WebSockets
lessons.description: Master WebSockets to enable real-time communication between client and server, suitable for chat apps, live updates, and more.

lessons.title: Introduction to Cloud Platforms
lessons.description: Get acquainted with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP, and understand their role in modern web development.

lessons.title: Containerization with Docker
lessons.description: Learn how to containerize your applications using Docker, making them easy to deploy and scale across different environments.

lessons.title: CI/CD Pipelines
lessons.description: Implement Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI, ensuring your applications are tested and deployed automatically.

lessons.title: Project Planning & Architecture
lessons.description: Plan and design the architecture for your full-stack project, considering both technical and business requirements.

lessons.title: Development & Iteration
lessons.description: Develop your project in phases, incorporating feedback and refining features as you progress.

lessons.title: Final Presentation & Deployment
lessons.description: Prepare and deliver a presentation of your project, and deploy it to a live environment for real-world use.
